name: Original PlayStation 5
description: The original PlayStation 5 console with ultra-fast SSD, providing incredibly fast load times.

name: PlayStation 5 Digital Edition (Original)
description: The digital edition of the original PlayStation 5, featuring the same great power without a disc drive.

name: Original PlayStation 4
description: The original PlayStation 4 console, offering an immersive gaming experience.

name: Original PlayStation 3
description: The original PlayStation 3 console, with Blu-ray capabilities and access to classic PS3 games.

name: Original PlayStation (PS1)
description: The classic original PlayStation console, where it all started.

name: PlayStation Portable (PSP)
description: The PlayStation Portable, offering gaming on the go with classic PS titles.

name: Gran Turismo
description: The classic Gran Turismo game for the PlayStation 1, featuring realistic racing simulations.

name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
description: A PS2 classic, GTA: San Andreas takes players on a journey through the fictional state of San Andreas.

name: Call of Duty: World at War
description: The World War II shooter for PlayStation 3, featuring gritty campaigns and multiplayer.

name: Horizon Zero Dawn: Complete Edition
description: The complete edition of Horizon Zero Dawn, an action RPG featuring Aloy on her journey.

name: Returnal
description: The PS5 exclusive roguelike, featuring intense third-person action in a mysterious alien world.

name: DualSense Controller
description: The DualSense Wireless Controller, featuring advanced haptic feedback and adaptive triggers.

name: DualShock 4 Controller
description: The DualShock 4 wireless controller for PlayStation 4, offering precision control.

name: HyperX Cloud Alpha Wireless Gaming Headsets
description: Wireless gaming headsets by HyperX, offering superior audio quality for gaming.

name: PlayStation Icon Lights
description: Decorate your room with the iconic PlayStation symbol lights, featuring colors that match the console.

name: Cole MacGrath Figure
description: A collectible figure of Cole MacGrath, the protagonist from the inFamous series.

name: PlayStation Icons T-shirt
description: A stylish t-shirt featuring the PlayStation symbols, perfect for any fan.
